reasoning: Benign (non-malignant) hydatidiform mole incidence approximately 1 per 100k pregnancies globally. Data from obstetric registries and gynecology studies, with geographic variation.
source: Sebire NJ et al. (2003). Hydatidiform mole: revised FIGO 2000 classification. Semin Reprod Med. 21(1):69-77
